name: Fractured Art
description:
This Game is NOT a Global Game Jam submission as it was done before the official time period.

I got inspired by the Global Game Jam theme but as I didn't have time to participate in the weekend on it I made the game between the 27th and 30th when the theme was announced and I combined the theme of Lost And Found with the monthly gmae jam theme of Budapest, Dimensional Shift to create this little game.

The goal of the game is to find paintings spread out in the tiny world and collect them all top finish. Pice together the paintings to progress through the level.
